EmailTemplate.name: Brand Campaign LPs.Send Retail Email 1.Whole Emails Test
EmailTemplate.subject: “How My Grocery Store Focuses on the Fresh”
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
From ecommerce to inventory, mobile shopping and contactless checkout, we have your back, so you can focus on customer experiences out front.
It’s true for the biggest global retailers to the most indie Mom-and-Pops.
In our newest e-book <[[https://www.ncr.com/content/dam/web/documents/landing-pages/brand-campaign/brand-campaign-retail_v2.pdf]]>, we break down the trends most disrupting you as you head into peak season—and a simple, five-point roadmap that gives you a clear path ahead. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
